1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators for text type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Type.Text
6  ( ropsTypeText,
7    -- * trim
8    consTrim, relmapTrim, relkitTrim,
9    -- * sweep
10    consSweep, relmapSweep, relkitSweep,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Rop
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
17
18-- | Implementation of relational operators.
19ropsTypeText :: (K.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
20ropsTypeText = Rop.rops "type"
21    [ consTrim
22      K.& [ "trim /P ... [-both /P ...] [-begin /P ...] [-end /P ...]"
23            K.& "-term* . -both? -begin? -end?" ]
24    , consSweep
25      K.& [ "sweep /P ... [-all]"
26            K.& "-term* . -all?" ]
27    ]
28
29-- ----------------------  trim
30
31-- | [trim \/P ... -both \/P ... -begin \/P ... -end \/P ...]
32--     Trim spaces of text content of term \/P ....
33--
34consTrim :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
35consTrim med =
36    do ns   <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
37       both <- Rop.getOpt [] Rop.getTerms med "-both"
38       beg  <- Rop.getOpt [] Rop.getTerms med "-begin"
39       end  <- Rop.getOpt [] Rop.getTerms med "-end"
40       Right $ relmapTrim med (ns ++ both, beg, end)
41
42-- | Create @trim@ relmap.
43relmapTrim :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> ([K.TermName], [K.TermName], [K.TermName]) -> C.Relmap c
44relmapTrim med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitTrim
45
46-- | Create @trim@ relkit.
47relkitTrim :: (K.CContent c) => ([K.TermName], [K.TermName], [K.TermName]) -> C.RelkitFlow c
48relkitTrim _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
49relkitTrim (both, begin, end) (Just he1)
50    | K.duplicated ns     = Msg.dupTerm ns
51    | K.newTermsExist pk  = Msg.newTerm pk he1
52    | otherwise           = Right kit
53    where
54      ns        = both ++ begin ++ end
55      pk        = K.termPicker ns he1
56      pkBoth    = K.termPicker both  he1
57      pkBegin   = K.termPicker begin he1
58      pkEnd     = K.termPicker end   he1
59      he2       = K.headMap (K.forwardTerms pk) he1
60      kit       = C.relkitLine False he2 flow
61      flow cs1  = let csBoth  = K.cTrimBoth  <$> K.pickTerms pkBoth  cs1
62                      csBegin = K.cTrimBegin <$> K.pickTerms pkBegin cs1
63                      csEnd   = K.cTrimEnd   <$> K.pickTerms pkEnd   cs1
64                  in csBoth ++ csBegin ++ csEnd ++ K.cutTerms pk cs1
65
66
67-- ----------------------  sweep
68
69-- | [sweep \/P ... -all]
70--     Sweep spaces of text content of term \/P ....
71--
72consSweep :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
73consSweep med =
74    do ns    <- Rop.getTerms  med "-term"
75       all_  <- Rop.getSwitch med "-all"
76       let f = choose all_ cSweepAll cSweep
77       Right $ relmapSweep med (f, ns)
78
79-- | Create @sweep@ relmap.
80relmapSweep :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> (K.Map c, [K.TermName]) -> C.Relmap c
81relmapSweep med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitSweep
82
83-- | Create @sweep@ relkit.
84relkitSweep :: (K.CContent c) => (K.Map c, [K.TermName]) -> C.RelkitFlow c
85relkitSweep _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
86relkitSweep (f, ns) (Just he1)
87    | K.duplicated ns     = Msg.dupTerm ns
88    | K.newTermsExist pk  = Msg.newTerm pk he1
89    | otherwise           = Right kit
90    where
91      pk        = K.termPicker ns he1
92      he2       = K.headMap (K.forwardTerms pk) he1
93      kit       = C.relkitLine False he2 flow
94      flow cs1  = let cs = f <$> K.pickTerms pk cs1
95                  in cs ++ K.cutTerms pk cs1
96
97cSweepAll :: (K.CContent c) => K.Map c
98cSweepAll c
99    | K.isText c  = K.pText $ K.sweepAll $ K.gText c
100    | otherwise   = c
101
102cSweep :: (K.CContent c) => K.Map c
103cSweep c
104    | K.isText c  = K.pText $ K.sweep $ K.gText c
105    | otherwise   = c
106
107choose :: Bool -> a -> a -> a
108choose True  x _ = x
109choose False _ y = y
110
